import './register.css' import { useState } from 'react' import { useAddUserMutation } from '../../features/userApi' const Register = ()=>{ const addUser = useAddUserMutation() const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName:'', lastName:'', email:'', password:'', }) const submitHandel = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() addUser(user) } return (
Registration
submitHandel(e)}>
setUser({...user,firstName:e.target.value}) } />
setUser({...user,lastName:e.target.value})} />
setUser({...user,email:e.target.value})}/>
setUser({...user,password:e.target.value})}/>
) } export default Register
